snippet: Three former associates of Lance Armstrong on Tuesday were banned for life from Olympic sports for their roles in what has been called a widespread doping conspiracy.
abstract: Three former associates of Lance Armstrong are banned for life from Olympic sports for their roles in what the United States Anti-Doping Agency has called a widespread doping conspiracy on Armstrong's Tour de France-winning teams.
lead_paragraph: Three former associates of Lance Armstrong on Tuesday were banned for life from Olympic sports for their roles in what has been called a widespread doping conspiracy.

headline.seo: 3 Associates of Lance Armstrong Receive Lifetime Bans
